title: Github repository
description: A github repository should be created to house the project and team members should have access

title: Single User SPA
description: It should be an app made for a single user.

title: Navbar
description: A component that displays the name and the logo of the app, shown on all the pages.

title: Footer
description: A component that displays a link to the GitHub repo of the project, shown on all the pages.

title: Sidebar
description: A sidebar component shown on all the pages. The component should display links to pages added to the app at a later stage.

title: Items List
description: A list of items showing the JSON data.

title: Conditional Rendering
description: Conditionally render content using boolean properties from the project’s JSON data.

title: Delete Items
description: A button on each list item that allows the user to delete the item from the list.

title: Dashboard Page
description: A page showing some stats about the items in the board that can act as a 'home page' for the user of the project.

title: Item Details Page
description: A page showing the details of the selected item from the list of items.

title: About Page
description: A page showing the project description and information about the team members (students) working on the project, including links to their GitHub and LinkedIn profiles.

title: Not Found Page
description: A page shown whenever the user navigates to a URL route that doesn’t exist in the app.

title: Create Item Form
description: A form that allows the user to create a new item and add it to the items list.

title: Update Item Form
description: A form that allows the user to update an existing item on the list.

title: Online storage
description: Add feature to save state of todos to external service. Use pantry with ID 03a06e51-b6b3-4f49-a584-22efe3180d55.

title: Drag and drop support
description: A user should be able to drag one item from a kanban track to another and, in doing so, change the status of that item to match the status of the track they dropped it into.

title: Presentation
description: A presentation about the creation of the project including minimal information on the people who created it.

title: Styling
description: Make app look good and all that.

title: code cleanup
description: Keep your code clean and organized by using descriptive variable names, correct indentation, removing any unused code, and maintaining proper file structure and naming.
